Correctness.description: The solution provided completely and accurately addresses the problem.

Clarity.description: The solution is presented in a clear and concise manner, and is easy to understand.

Completeness.description: The solution covers all aspects of the problem and leaves no loose ends.

Steps_Logic.description: The logical flow of the steps in the solution is easy to follow and understand.

Efficiency.description: The solution is efficient in terms of the time and steps required to solve the problem.
